idea-plugin.name: VimMulticursor
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful extension for IdeaVim that brings Sublime/VSCode-style multiple cursors and selections to your IDE.
Key Features: • Multiple Cursors (mc prefix) - Add/remove cursors at specific positions (mcc) - Convert virtual cursors to real ones (mcr) - Clear all cursors (mcd) - Add cursors at word boundaries (mcaw) - Smart bracket/quote matching (mcia, mcaa)
• Multiple Selections (ms prefix) - Select by regex pattern (ms/) - Text object selections (msib, msiB, etc.) - Word-based selections (msw, msb) - Character navigation (msf, msF, mst, msT)
• Text Objects Support - Words: aw (around word), iw (inside word) - Brackets: ab/ib (), aB/iB {} - Quotes: a'/i' '', a"/i" "", a`/i` `` - Smart any-bracket: aa (around any), ia (inside any)
• Navigation Commands - Word-based: w/W (next word), b/B (prev word), e/E (word end) - Character-based: f/F (find char), t/T (till char) - Pattern-based: / (regex search)
• Intelligent Features - Context-aware bracket matching - Nested quotes/brackets handling - Works within selected text regions - Preserves relative cursor positions
Configuration: 1. Add 'set multicursor' to ~/.ideavimrc 2. Optional key mappings available (see docs)
For detailed usage examples and full documentation: https://github.com/dankinsoid/VimMulticursor
